mapper.select: SELECT id, nickname, email, gender, age, profile_img, grade FROM member WHERE id= #{_parameter}
select pixel from member where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update member set pixel = pixel-${pixel_want_exchange} where id=#{id}
insert into pixel_history(id, pixel_log, history_detail) values(#{id}, -${pixel_want_exchange}, '픽셀환전')
mapper.select: SELECT m.pixel, p.pixel_log, p.history_date, p.history_detail FROM pixel_history p join member m on p.id = m.id where m.id = #{id} order by p.pixel_history_sno desc, p.history_date desc limit ${startNo}, ${listSize}

SELECT m.pixel, p.pixel_log, p.history_date, p.history_detail FROM pixel_history p join member m on p.id = m.id where m.id = #{id} and (p.history_detail='픽셀구매' or p.history_detail='출석체크' or p.history_detail='Q&A답변채택' or p.history_detail='멘토활동' or p.history_detail='프리미엄리뷰 작성') order by p.pixel_history_sno desc, p.history_date desc limit ${startNo}, ${listSize}

SELECT m.pixel, p.pixel_log, p.history_date, p.history_detail FROM pixel_history p join member m on p.id = m.id where m.id = #{id} and (p.history_detail='픽셀환전' or p.history_detail='Q&A질문글작성' or p.history_detail='멘티상담완료' or p.history_detail='프리미엄리뷰 열람' or p.history_detail='픽셀환전승인완료') order by p.pixel_history_sno desc, p.history_date desc limit ${startNo}, ${listSize}
select COUNT(pixel_history_sno) from pixel_history where id = #{id}
select COUNT(pixel_history_sno) from pixel_history where id = #{id} and pixel_log < 0
select COUNT(pixel_history_sno) from pixel_history where id = #{id} and pixel_log > 0
mapper.update: update member set mento_status = 1 where id = #{id}
